message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I think I can agree to $120 for the product. Looking forward to your response.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I believe the product is worth more than your offer, I'm willing to come down to $135.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your price. I appreciate it. I would like to counter with an offer of $125 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
